verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Though we may waver, He remaineth steadfast, And all His words are sure; From everlasting unto everlasting, His promises endure.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Though we may wander, He will not forsake us, Truer than earthly friend; He never fails our trust, for having loved us, He loves unto the end.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Unto the end; we doubt Him, we deny Him, We wound Him, we forget; We get some earthly idol up between us, Without one faint regret.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And when it falls or crumbles, and in anguish, We seek this changeless Friend, Lo, He receives us, comforts and forgives us, And loves us to the end.
